des:
You'll need to use the GMY SMART app for iOS or Android to connect your lights to your home network.With the gmysmart skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your GMY SMART lights. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your GMY SMART accout and say,"Alexa, discover my devices" or running a device discovery in the Smart Home screen of the Alexa app.

On/Off Controls:
 You can turn devices on/off, for example: "Alexa, turn on my {device name}" or "Alexa, turn off my {device name}".
 You can set the brightness, for example: "Alexa, set my {device name} to 50 percent". 
 
Color Controls:
 You can change the device's color, say, "Alexa, set my {device name} to yellow". And you can also control color temperature,for example: "Alexa, set the {device name} to warm white".
